other_tests.findings: The tract was lined by squamous epithelium with minor salivary glandular tissue.
Gentian violet dye was used to trace and remove the entire tract; meticulous dissection was performed to remove the entire lining while preserving surrounding tissues.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At a 6-month follow-up, the patient had no complications, including mucocele formation or recurrence of inflammation.
